document_data.name: Ambrara
document_data.mainbody: '''Ambrara''' was the name of an inhabited settlement somewhere in [[Faer√ªn]] during the early-to-mid 8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: During the {{yearlinkName|761}}, the sage [[Beldrune]] told his fellow [[Tabarast]] that he had once been an actor in the original play version of ''[[The Stormy Knight]]'', as the Second Undergardener, in Ambrara.
